Title: Mom
Writer: Girish Kohli (dialogue), Girish Kohli (screenplay), Girish Kohli (story), Ravi Udyawar (story), Kona Venkat (story)
Actors: Sridevi, Akshaye Khanna, Sajal Ali, Adnan Siddiqui
Plot: Devaki is a biology teacher at the same school attended by her stepdaughter Arya. Although, Devaki is a caring mother, Arya remains distant. One unfortunate night, Arya is brutally attacked...
